```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

```

```{r}
storedata <- read.csv("storedata.csv")
storedata$Order_Date <- as.Date(storedata$Order_Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
```

```{r}

regions <- storedata %>%
  filter(Region == c("Region 1", "Region 9")) %>%
  filter(Customer_Segment == c("Corporate", "Consumer")) %>%
  filter(Order_Date >= "2017-10-01", Order_Date <= "2017-12-30")

Region1 <- regions %>%
  filter(Region == "Region 1")

Region1$October <- Region1$Sales[[6]] + Region1$Sales[[2]]
Region1$November <- Region1$Sales[[1]] + Region1$Sales[[5]] + Region1$Sales[[8]]
Region1$December <- Region1$Sales[[3]] + Region1$Sales[[4]] + Region1$Sales[[7]]

Region9 <- regions %>%
  filter(Region == "Region 9")

```
